english_translation: As the mind becomes full, the river of emotion becomes a flood,
Traveling towards the ocean in the throb of confluence.

kannada_original: ಯಾವ ಚಿಂತನೆ ಹನಿಗೆ ಯಾವ ಅಲೆ ಕಾದಿದೆಯೊ !
english_transliteration: Yāva cintane hanige yāva ale kādideyō !
english_translation: Which wave is waiting for which drop of thought!
This body is the dwelling place of rasa (aesthetic delight) – Muddu Rāma.
